{"blocks":[{"key":"7iki1","text":"Briefly spin the microcentrifuge tubes using a tabletop micro-centrifuge to collect the sample at the bottom of the tube and then load onto the gel. {"blocks":[{"key":"ae4dm","text":"Pre-wet PVDF membrane for   with 100% methanol, then soak in transfer buffer for about 1 hour.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3odl0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eg7j8","text":"Stain for total protein by following the protocol for the  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":57,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"41064C55341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"REVERT Total Protein Stain Kit","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"926-11010","stats":{"total_protocols":0},"url":"https://www.licor.com/bio/products/reagents/revert_total_protein_stain/index.html","vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.licor.com/bio","name":"LI-COR"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3heq4","text":"Decant the blocking buffer and add the appropriate primary antibody dilution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3dp1q","text":"Incubate the membrane and the primary antibody dilution at 4°C overnight with gentle shaking.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"boojc","text":"Rinse the membrane briefly with ddH2O. Add secondary antibodies (1:10000) diluted in Licor blocking buffer solution + Tween20 (0.5%) and incubate for 1 hour covered in aluminum foil at room temperature with gentle agitation.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":224,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7fca5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bofkb","text":"After the secondary antibody incubation, wash as outlined in Step 16. Add a fourth and final wash with ddH2O for 15 minutes.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":124,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"254l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dd32q","text":"Image the membrane using the Li-COR Odyssey M system.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8501c","text":"Block the membranes for 1 hr using Li-Cor Intercept (TBS) blocking buffer    (enough to cover the membrane).  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":74,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":108,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bht0a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cas_number":"","group_reagent":{},"guid":"344EAF6BC40E4175A238D08EFEB2FB33","id":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Li-Cor Intercept (TBS) blocking buffer (Li-Cor, P/N: 927-60001)","rrid":"","sku":"P/N: 927-60001","url":"https://www.netascientific.com/blocking-reagents/lic-927-60001","vendor":{"id":130,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.licor.com/bio","name":"LI-COR"}}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eicip","text":"Decant the primary antibodies. Wash the membrane with 1X TBS + 0.5% Tween20 + 0.3% sodium azide for 15 minutes with gentle shaking. Repeat the wash 2 more times.
